meanings: (틀림없이) surely, certainly, without fail, (기필코) at any cost, at all costs, no matter what (the cost)

vlive.korean: [이들 중 반드시 한 팀은 탈락한다!] [One of them must be out!] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 15. 겉바속촉 회기파전 아님! 경희대vs한국외대의 회기파戰에 낀 성균관! 그 결과는?
[3팀 중 반드시 1팀이 탈락한다!] [1 out of the 3 must go home!] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 15. 겉바속촉 회기파전 아님! 경희대vs한국외대의 회기파戰에 낀 성균관! 그 결과는?
vlive.english: [1 out of the 3 must go home!]

vlive.korean: [반드시 1팀이 탈락하는 1라운드!] [1 team has to be eliminated!] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 15. 겉바속촉 회기파전 아님! 경희대vs한국외대의 회기파戰에 낀 성균관! 그 결과는?

[두 팀 중 한 팀은 반드시 탈락하는 2라운드 '팀 배틀전'] 들어가요? [One of the two teams will not make it to the next round] Should we go in? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 18. 용인대 리퍼블릭 VS 고려대 테라 배틀에 심사위원 실화?!
vlive.english: [One of the two teams will not make it to the next round] Should we go in?

vlive.korean: [반드시 밍키 섹시 잡히는 거 봐야겠거든] 나는! [I need to see Min Gi doing this] I'm... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [ATEEZ] 팬클럽명은 G9야.. 이 지구가 다 귀요미그룹 A4 사랑하니ㄲr..🧡 (ATEEZ talking about their position in A4)
vlive.english: [I need to see Min Gi doing this] I'm...

examples.korean: Make sure the table is securely anchored. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 반드시 탁자를 단단히 고정시키세요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Make sure the table is securely anchored. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This garment must be dry-cleaned only. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 의류는 반드시 드라이클리닝을 해야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This garment must be dry-cleaned only. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Always chew food well before swallowing it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 음식을 삼키기 전에 반드시 잘 씹어라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Always chew food well before swallowing it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Make sure the ropes are securely fastened. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 반드시 밧줄이 확실히[단단히] 묶여지도록 하라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Make sure the ropes are securely fastened. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Food must be prepared in hygienic conditions. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 음식은 반드시 위생적인 환경에서 조리해야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Food must be prepared in hygienic conditions. Add to Wordbook
